title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.13 - Position at starting post
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.13 - Position at starting post

State Regulations

The horses shall be started as far as possible in a
line, but may be started at such reasonable distance behind the starting post
as the starter thinks necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4034.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
